title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 84.1 - Right of access by school board members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 84.1 - Right of access by school board members

State Regulations
A board of education shall have right of access to
personnel records of employees of the district, subject to the procedures
hereinafter set forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
84.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
